channel.title: [667] Dominion Tower [Array Index Out of Bounds Exception -1]

item.title: [667] Dominion Tower [Array Index Out of Bounds Exception -1]
item.dc:creator: @masan05 masan05
item.description:
@masan05 wrote:

Hi. I am trying to get Dominion Tower working on my server. I always get these when working with arrays can someone please explain why this is happening:

Code:

(532)public NPC[] createBosses() { (533)NPC[] bosses = new NPC[BOSSES[nextBossIndex].ids.length]; (534)for (int i = 0; i < BOSSES[nextBossIndex].ids.length; i++)]

Now this is executed when clicking an object… When i click that object nothing happens but in my (server) cmd prompt this appears:

Java.Lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException -1 (DominionTower.java:533)

With a bunch more stuff like pointing to the CreateBosses(). I’d post the whole error if i could, but my server is running and i cant edit it without the server shutting down (the cmd prompt that is). Here is the full createBosses() code… tell me why it’s getting an error please:

public NPC[] createBosses() { NPC[] bosses = new NPC[BOSSES[nextBossIndex].ids.length]; for (int i = 0; i < BOSSES[nextBossIndex].ids.length; i++) bosses[i] = World .spawnNPC(BOSSES[nextBossIndex].ids[i], new WorldTile( getBaseX() + 37 + (i * 2), getBaseY() + 31, 2), -1, true, true); return bosses; }

thanks so much!

Read full topic
